Reviews.Title: “One Night; Good stay”

Reviews.Content: returning weeklong stay india provide decent value prices location gateway bbq short walk american bbq cold beer choices check bbq choices 5 miles hotel stayed night enjoyed neighborhood walking decent hotel conditions hotel busy bright lots people coming recommended gateway traveler looking reasonable accommodations close changi airport

Reviews.Content: considering rates hotels singapore value money spacious window hotels singapore serve breakfast charge internet access dongle interior hotel vegetarian options near hotel food hotel bit center city getting paya lebar mrt station 10 min walk 5 sgd taxi overall worth staying duration stay

Reviews.Title: “Good clean accommodation”

Reviews.Content: stayed night september 2010 clean location loads nearby eateries cheapish surcharges event weekends formula 1 10 hour late checkouts exception check 3 am basic bathrooms ok air conditioning limited cable tv service internet price

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Good Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: Blackpool-Jen
Reviews.Content: hotel apparently located edge red light district singapore didnt unsavoury booked deluxe windowless reception staff apologised key window overlooking green rear hotel okay little dated bedding clean bathroom lot mould tiles actual toilet bath basin clean hot water shower bath days adequate 711 door supermarket road hotel situated near paya lebar mrt stations walked joo chat road waterfront lovely budget simple clean hotel handy location
